headline: Fidelity National Information Services (NYSE:FIS) Unveils AI-Powered Treasury GPT With Microsoft Azure
summary: Fidelity National Information Services (NYSE:FIS) unveiled its AI-driven Treasury GPT tool, marking a significant advancement in treasury management technology, developed in partnership with Microsoft. Despite receiving recognition for innovation, shares of FIS fell by 1.29% over the past week. This decline occurred amid a volatile market environment where broader index trends showed the S&P 500 and Nasdaq experiencing declines of over 3%, largely due to economic concerns surrounding U.S...

headline: FIS Launches Treasury GPT, a Pioneering AI-based Product Support Tool for the Treasury Industry
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., March 10, 2025--FIS® (NYSE: FIS), a global leader in financial technology, today announced the launch of FIS Treasury and Risk Manager - Treasury GPT, a proprietary generative AI-driven product support tool embedded within its FIS Treasury and Risk Manager – Integrity Edition ("Integrity"). In collaboration with Microsoft, the tool uses Microsoft Azure OpenAI Service for enhanced data and risk management, and quickly generates responses on queries pertaining to product usabil
